title: Ticket #1274: --better-analyze should tell you actual resources in each bucket
description:
A LIGO user had asked this question: 

How can I see *which* machines are in each of these buckets?

8687286.000:  Run analysis summary.  Of 1458 machines,
   1228 are rejected by your job's requirements
    160 match but are serving users with a better priority in the pool
    [other output elided]

It turns out there is no easy way. It would be very useful if we could since it'll make debugging complex problems like "why is this better priority user not having more jobs than a worse priority user and it has been in this stable state for several days." much easier to debug.
remarks:

It was found that greg thain independently did the work associated with this ticket. Since I knew of this ticket and mentioned it to him after the fact, it got resolved.
